name: shannon andrews
text: Wings are amazing and got extra dipping sauce with my order which made it so much better.

name: Shay Gilbert
text: This is wat u get when u order boneless honey bbq....smh never again will i order from pizza hut again.

name: JC
text: Used to have good pizza. Worse than little caesars now.

name: Marvelous_LXVII
text: I would put 5 stars if you guys will learn to cut the pizza all the way through. Hint: Do not put one box on top of the other and then cut. Cut ALL the pizzas on a hard, flat surface.

name: Zach Dickerson
text: Terrible experience. Pizza was crusty and stale in places, soggy and uncooked in others. I hated it. It took 30 mins to place my order correctly, lady on was phone was rude. 3 hours to get my order delivered and they didn't even cut it. SLOW LAZY RUDE PEOPLE

name: Danette Roberts
text: This store manager, Willa, is unbelievably rude.  Her employees follow her lead.  Last order made wrong (no surprise)  but since I'm sick of eating pizza I didn't order which is the norm for this location, I called to complain.   Promised …More

name: Pamela Blade
text: Have not gotten a decent pizza in at least 2 years. They put very little ingredients  on pizza. Most people are finally realizing they will not get a good pizza. Someone must be having ingredient cost issues because they cheat you on …More

name: Blovenation Brandon Lovell
text: Pizza is never done anuff effecting the taste quality

name: Pamela Braly
text: Our bread sticks were not cut at all.. The thin and crispy was not crispy.. A little disappointed

name: Chris Hyles
text: Pizza's was not cut properly, our slices was was tearing up.called the manager and he did nothing, they need a better manager that would actually do his job right.

name: Randy Ranck
text: Awful. Food horrible past several orders, manager has issues and it is embarrassing to think she is all they can find to manage place.. they will not put right amount of ingredients on. Skimping going on. Do not eat from  here, not until it …More

name: Rylee Brown
text: We ordered 2 large pizzas. They told us it would be ready in 30 minutes after and 54 minutes of waiting we were told they haven’t even been made yet. Very disorganized and no communication going on in the back. We will be going to domino’s from now on!

name: Stacy Chapa
text: The girl they had answering the phone on 3-7-20 was extremely rude & hateful to my daughter. Pizza Hut could use more training in customer service.

name: Stewie Motui
text: Worse place to eat,  They dont deliver to truck drivers, idiotic PIZZA HUT "policy"

name: Nicole Emerson
text: Ordered two 16 count bone out wing orders around 6:30 pm, did not get the delivery until an hour later around 7:37pm when it was estimated to take 20-30 minutes. Tracking did not work because even an hour later after delivery, still says …More

name: Nick Fancher
text: Just like everything else here in Pulaski, this place is unprofessional and not properly equipped with management that can handle their jobs. I order a pizza and have to cancel because their only delivery drivers truck “broke down” right before closing time. Seriously a huge disappointment.

name: Jennifer Doggett
text: Good food. Fast service. Establishment was clean

name: TAYLOR HAY
text: Awful service. From out of town and tried to order a pizza to the Hampton Inn which is literally right across the street and it took 20 mins on the phone to get my order straightened out. Then I found out my relatively small order would take 1.5 hours to complete... also the folks answering the phone were total nimrods.

name: Kristina Garrett
text:
Can I give it less stars?? Holy buckets what a rude woman of a manager!! She is the absolute worst, rudest and unfriendly person to deal with.
Ordered and paid for a pizza on the app. Showed up to pick it up in the 30 …More

name: Mike Zlock
text: Fast service.

name: Mike Henson
text: Pizzas are great, service is quick. Only wished you could eat indoors.

name: Molly Stahl
text: Love Pizza hut! If you're not a reward member, you should! Lots of free pizza! Also the mini Cinnabons are beyond amazing!

name: Shelley W
text: Always fantastic when other Pizza Hut (and other brand) experiences have not always been consistent.  Pulaski Pizza hut has always been excellent, hot and ready when indicated from ordering off the App.  I have to pick up based on where I live, but it's always great!

name: Cindy Stammer
text: Always enjoy eating there. Food has been good and always friendly service. Never had a problem. Thank you employees for a job well done!

name: Anthony Furness
text: Have good pizza but don't deliver every place. Just where they want to. Don't everyone drives or leave there job  & make it across town to pick up there food.

name: Stacy O.
text: Called due to having issues ordering online and whomever answered the phone was rude as hell. Completely understand that you may be having electrical issues today but you need to work on your customer service. You didnt have to cut me off …More

name: Renee Taylor
text: It was wonderful. Our pizzas were fabulous! Great crew!

name: Asheton Pierce
text: Terrible service. Rude employees. The manager is the absolute worst, the rudest of them all!

name: Mandy
text: This is our go to for pizza cravings! Delivery people are always cool and they've only screwed up once or twice out of the many times we've ordered. Once being late for a party delivery that was ordered way ahead of time and then once for …More

name: Jacob Courtney
text: Waited 30 mins for pizza. Then a worker put it in the warm box and never asked whose it was. I had to ask if my food was ready to get it. ALWAYS have to wait there for food. NOT RECOMENDED!

name: Steven Morrow
text: Too long to serve, at least they are friendly. Watched a girl that worked there clean/scrape something off of a buffet plate with her fingernail and return it to the clean stack. Food is decent, usually. I try not to eat here. A but sceptical.

name: Stanley Mccree
text: Since they moved, not so good service or food. Now they won't even deliver to the same customers. Bad decision to say the least.

name: dj thomas
text: 10 miles from the store all highway. Offered 25 dollar tip to bring pizza wouldnt do it. No customer serivce at all. Waoted half hour on phone just for that. Thanks but no thanks.

name: Beck Norm
text: Awesome food and awesome service!!  FRESH PIZZA ON THE BUFFET

name: Davey Diaz
text: Lol I love ur ranch I barley go but the buffet is nice love the people

name: Amanda Venable
text: We went for lunch because our daughter begged us.  The Lunch buffet could not keep up with pizzas.  They would put some out and immediately run out with a long wait for more.  Felt as if I had to race other diners to get pizza.

name: Alvin Reynolds Sr
text: Fresh hand chopped vegetables what more can I say.

name: Javis Olson
text: Pizza Hut in Pulaski has always provided me with great service!

name: Matthew Cardinal
text: Very poor service.  Called and ordered pizza's for peewee  little league team,4 pizza's. Was told 45 min wait time. Showed up 45 mins later and guess what no pizza's no order under my name. Apparently they use a call center,which is was not …More

name: Angela Curtis
text: The manager there is,rude snapping,staff is excellent prices good but we got Lawrenceburg pizza hut over the manager at Pulaski food ,staff manager excellent there

name: Brad C
text: Been here an hour and still waiting.  We are the only dine in customers they have.  Last time i asked if they were close i heard waitress ask and response was they were about to put them in.  First time in my life i wish there was a negative star rating.

name: Sarah
text: Worst pizza Hut ever.  Pizza Hut is my very favorite pizza but I will never again eat at this particular one. The pizza is always nasty and cold and my order is never correct! I've never had such bad service from a Pizza Hut before period

name: chrystal noble
text: Good food

name: Heath Rose
text: Food is good, but restaurant is very rundown.

name: Mr Potts
text: Never placed an order for l8r online b4. didnt know i would get a  confirmation email when it was delivered so i called the store and they were very rude. will never order from them again. this is the last time
